channel.title: Emacs on S.P.A.M.
channel.description: Recent content in Emacs on S.P.A.M.

item.title: Useless Blog #2
item.description: Happy New Year everybody!! Yes I know I’m a week late. Sue me. What a week its been! I attended my very first “real hackers don’t sleep” 2 day hackathon! I got sick at my very first “real hackers don’t sleep” 2 day hackathon! I threw up at my very first “real hackers don’t sleep” 2 day hackathon! And then I swore that I would never again attend any “real hackers don’t sleep” 2 day hackathons ever again!
